trans-unit.source: Listens for connections from TCP network clients.
trans-unit.target: 接聽 TCP 網路用戶端的連接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> class provides simple methods that listen for and accept incoming connection requests in blocking synchronous mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>類別會提供簡單的方法接聽及接受連入連線要求中封鎖同步模式。

trans-unit.source: You can use either a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> or a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to connect with a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>要用來連接<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>。

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> using an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>, a Local IP address and port number, or just a port number.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>使用<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>，本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼或連接埠的數字。

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any> for the local IP address and 0 for the local port number if you want the underlying service provider to assign those values for you.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any>本機 IP 位址和本機連接埠號碼，如果您希望基礎服務提供者，針對您指定這些值為 0。

trans-unit.source: If you choose to do this, you can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A> property to identify the assigned information, after the socket has connected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您選擇這樣做，您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>內容來識別已指派的資訊之後已連接的通訊端。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method to begin listening for incoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>開始接聽連入連線要求的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> will queue incoming connections until you either call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method or it has queued <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.MaxConnections>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> 會將佇列的連入連線，直到您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法或它已經排入佇列<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.MaxConnections>。

trans-unit.source: Use either <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> to pull a connection from the incoming connection request queue.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>提取來自內送連接要求佇列的連接。

trans-unit.source: These two methods will block.
trans-unit.target: 這兩個方法會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: If you want to avoid blocking, you can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A> method first to determine if connection requests are available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要避免封鎖，您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A>方法，以判斷連線要求是否有可用的佇列中。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method to close the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法，關閉<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method does not close any accepted connections.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法不會關閉任何已接受的連接。

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for closing these separately.
trans-unit.target: 您必須負責個別關閉這些項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> for a client example.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>如用戶端的範例。

trans-unit.source: to establish an outgoing connection or accept an incoming request.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立傳出連線，或接受連入要求。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The port on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 通訊埠，將會在此處接聽連入的連接嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> class that listens on the specified port.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體包含指定的設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式已經過時。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPAddress%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPAddress%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to specify the port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓您指定要接聽連入連線嘗試的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: With this constructor, the underlying service provider assigns the most appropriate network address.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式，以基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的網路位址。

trans-unit.source: If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您並不在意哪些本機連接埠使用，您可以指定連接埠號碼 0。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the service provider will assign an available ephemeral port number.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，服務提供者將會指派可用的暫時連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用此方法時，您可以探索哪些本機網路位址和通訊埠編號已被指派使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>開始接聽連入連線嘗試的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> using a local port number.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>使用本機連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="port" /> is not between <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" /> and <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="port" /> 不在 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" /> 之間。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" /> that represents the local endpoint to which to bind the listener <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.IPEndPoint" />，表示接聽項 (Listener) <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 所要繫結至的本機端點。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> class with the specified local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的本機端點，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓您指定的本機 IP 位址和通訊埠編號上接聽連入連線嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Before using this constructor, you must create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using the desired local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 之前使用這個建構函式，您必須建立<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用所需的本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: Pass this <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> to the constructor as the `localEP` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 將此變數傳遞<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>做為建構函式`localEP`參數。

trans-unit.source: If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=nameWithType> as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address.
trans-unit.target: 如果您並不在意哪些本機位址指派，您可以建立<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=nameWithType>位址參數，以及基礎的服務提供者會指派最適當的網路位址。

trans-unit.source: This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於簡化您的應用程式，如果您有多個網路介面。

trans-unit.source: If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using 0 for the port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您並不在意哪些本機連接埠使用，您可以建立<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用連接埠號碼 0。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the service provider will assign an available ephemeral port number.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，服務提供者將會指派可用的暫時連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用此方法時，您可以探索哪些本機網路位址和通訊埠編號已被指派使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>開始接聽連入連線嘗試的方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> class using the local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>類別使用的本機端點。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="localEP" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="localEP" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" /> that represents the local IP address.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.IPAddress" />，表示本機 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The port on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 通訊埠，將會在此處接聽連入的連接嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> class that listens for incoming connection attempts on the specified local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體會在指定的本機 IP 位址和通訊埠編號上接聽連入的連接嘗試。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓您指定的本機 IP 位址和通訊埠編號上接聽連入連線嘗試。

trans-unit.source: Before calling this constructor you must first create an <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> using the desired local address.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個建構函式之前您必須先建立<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>使用所需的本機位址。

trans-unit.source: Pass this <xref:System.Net.IPAddress> to the constructor as the `localaddr` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 將此變數傳遞<xref:System.Net.IPAddress>做為建構函式`localaddr`參數。

trans-unit.source: If you do not care which local address is assigned, specify <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the `localaddr` parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address.
trans-unit.target: 如果您並不在意哪些本機位址指派，指定<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=nameWithType>如`localaddr`參數和基礎的服務提供者將會指派最適當的網路位址。

trans-unit.source: This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 這有助於簡化您的應用程式，如果您有多個網路介面。

trans-unit.source: If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果您並不在意哪些本機連接埠使用，您可以指定連接埠號碼 0。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，服務提供者會指派可用的通訊埠編號介於 1024年到 5000 之間。

trans-unit.source: If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用此方法時，您可以探索哪些本機網路位址和通訊埠編號已被指派使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>開始接聽連入連線嘗試的方法。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> class using a local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>類別使用本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="localaddr" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="localaddr" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="port" /> is not between <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" /> and <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="port" /> 不在 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MinPort" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Net.IPEndPoint.MaxPort" /> 之間。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a pending connection request.
trans-unit.target: 接受暫止連接要求。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> used to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 用來傳送和接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> is a blocking method that returns a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that you can use to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> 已封鎖的方法會傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>可用來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: If you want to avoid blocking, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A> method to determine if connection requests are available in the incoming connection queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要避免封鎖，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A>方法來判斷連線要求是否有可用的連入連線佇列中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>傳回初始化與遠端主機的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use any of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> methods available in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class to communicate with the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用任一<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>中可用的方法<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>類別來與遠端主機通訊。

trans-unit.source: When you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, be sure to call its <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 完畢時使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，務必呼叫其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If your application is relatively simple, consider using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method rather than the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式相當簡單，請考慮使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法而非<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> 您提供簡單的方法來傳送和接收資料，透過封鎖同步模式中的網路。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method is used to return a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 在下列程式碼範例中，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法用來傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is used to communicate with the newly connected client.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>用來與剛連線的用戶端通訊。

trans-unit.source: The listener has not been started with a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" />.
trans-unit.target: 尚未以呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" /> 來啟動接聽項。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a pending connection request as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步作業的方式接受暫止連接要求。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> used to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件上的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 屬性會傳回用來傳送和接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after the socket connection has been accepted.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>已接受通訊端連線之後，物件會完成。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned in <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>中傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>初始化與遠端主機的 IP 位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: You can use any of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> methods available in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class to communicate with the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用任一<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>中可用的方法<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>類別來與遠端主機通訊。

trans-unit.source: When you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, be sure to call its <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 完畢時使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，務必呼叫其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If your application is relatively simple, consider using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method rather than the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocketAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式相當簡單，請考慮使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法而非<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocketAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> 您提供簡單的方法來傳送和接收資料，透過封鎖同步模式中的網路。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The listener has not been started with a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" />.
trans-unit.target: 尚未以呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" /> 來啟動接聽項。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a pending connection request.
trans-unit.target: 接受暫止連接要求。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> used to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 用來傳送和接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> is a blocking method that returns a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> that you can use to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> 已封鎖的方法會傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>可用來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A> method to determine if connection requests are available in the incoming connection queue if you want to avoid blocking.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A>方法來判斷是否連線要求可以使用連入連線佇列，是否您想要避免封鎖。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> of the returned <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以取得基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> will provide you with methods for sending and receiving with the remote host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>會為您提供方法來傳送和接收的遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: When you are through with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>, be sure to call its <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是透過與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>，務必呼叫其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want greater flexibility than a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> offers, consider using <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要更大的彈性比<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>優惠，請考慮使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: In the following code example, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method is used to return a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>.
trans-unit.target: 在下列程式碼範例中，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法用來傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> is used to communicate with the newly connected client.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>用來與剛連線的用戶端通訊。

trans-unit.source: The listener has not been started with a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" />.
trans-unit.target: 尚未以呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" /> 來啟動接聽項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode" /> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode" /> 屬性取得特定錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: When you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦取得這個錯誤碼，您就可以參閱 MSDN 中的 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤碼文件，以取得錯誤的詳細描述。

trans-unit.source: Accepts a pending connection request as an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步作業的方式接受暫止連接要求。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" />。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> property on the task object returns a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" /> used to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 工作物件上的 <see cref="P:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1.Result" /> 屬性會傳回用來傳送和接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient" />。

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 這項作業不會封鎖。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after the TCP connection has been accepted.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>已接受 TCP 連線之後，物件會完成。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to obtain the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> of the returned <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以取得基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>中<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> will provide you with methods for sending and receiving with the remote host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>會為您提供方法來傳送和接收的遠端主機。

trans-unit.source: When you are through with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>, be sure to call its <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是透過與<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>，務必呼叫其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Close%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want greater flexibility than a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> offers, consider using <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocketAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要更大的彈性比<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>優惠，請考慮使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocketAsync%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.source: The listener has not been started with a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" />.
trans-unit.target: 尚未以呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" /> 來啟動接聽項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode" /> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode" /> 屬性取得特定錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: When you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦取得這個錯誤碼，您就可以參閱 MSDN 中的 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤碼文件，以取得錯誤的詳細描述。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> is actively listening for client connections.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 是否正在接聽用戶端連接。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> is actively listening; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 正在接聽則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> can use this property to determine if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is currently listening for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>可以使用這個屬性來判斷如果<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>目前正在接聽連入連線嘗試。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Active%2A> property can be used to avoid redundant <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> attempts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Active%2A>屬性可以用來避免多餘<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>嘗試。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that specifies whether to enable or disable NAT traversal.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指定是否啟用或停用 NAT 周遊。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables Network Address Translation (NAT) traversal on a <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 啟用或停用在 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 執行個體上的網路位址轉譯 (NAT) 周遊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AllowNatTraversal%2A> method is used to enable or disable NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AllowNatTraversal%2A>方法用來啟用或停用的 NAT 周遊<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 Teredo、 6to4 或 ISATAP 通道提供 NAT 周遊。

trans-unit.source: When the `allowed` parameter is false, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.IPProtectionLevel> option on the associated socket is set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel.EdgeRestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 當`allowed`參數為 false，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.IPProtectionLevel>相關聯的通訊端上的選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel.EdgeRestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This explicitly disables NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> instance.
trans-unit.target: 此明確地停用的 NAT 周遊<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When the `allowed` parameter is true, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.IPProtectionLevel> option on the associated socket is set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 當`allowed`參數為 true，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.IPProtectionLevel>相關聯的通訊端上的選項設定為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This may allow NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> depending on firewall rules in place on the system.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會讓 NAT 周遊<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>根據在系統上的防火牆規則。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AllowNatTraversal%2A> method must be invoked prior to calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method to begin listening for incoming connection requests (before the socket is bound).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AllowNatTraversal%2A>必須叫用方法呼叫之前<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>来開始接聽連入連線要求 （繫結通訊端） 之前的方法。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AllowNatTraversal%2A> method is called after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method, then an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AllowNatTraversal%2A>方法之後呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法，則<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32.
trans-unit.target: Teredo 位址是 IPv6 位址首碼為 2001年:: / 32。

trans-unit.source: Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.
trans-unit.target: Teredo 位址可透過一般的 DNS 名稱解析傳回或列舉為指派給本機介面的 IPv6 位址。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AllowNatTraversal(System.Boolean)" /> method was called after calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" /> method
trans-unit.target: 已在呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AllowNatTraversal(System.Boolean)" /> 方法之後呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" /> 方法

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AsyncCallback" /> 委派，會於作業完成時參考要叫用的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object containing information about the accept operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義物件，包含接受作業資訊。

trans-unit.source: This object is passed to the <c>callback</c> delegate when the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 <c>callback</c> 委派。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to accept an incoming connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步作業以接受連入的連接嘗試。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous creation of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />，參考 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 的非同步建立。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.BeginAcceptSocket%2A> operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.EndAcceptSocket%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 非同步<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.BeginAcceptSocket%2A>作業必須完成呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.EndAcceptSocket%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，方法由叫用`callback`委派。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要封鎖的作業完成之前，請使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.RemoteEndPoint%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to identify the remote host's network address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.RemoteEndPoint%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>來識別遠端主機的網路位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/) for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 如果您收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來取得特定錯誤碼，並請參閱 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤的程式碼文件位於 MSDN library 中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)詳細的動作錯誤的描述。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously accepts an incoming connection attempt and creates a new <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> to handle remote host communication.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> used to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: 用來傳送和接收資料的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會封鎖直到作業完成。

trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式執行這項作業，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.RemoteEndPoint%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to identify the remote host's network address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.RemoteEndPoint%2A>屬性傳回之<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>來識別遠端主機的網路位址和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.BeginAcceptTcpClient%2A> method to create and connect a socket.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.BeginAcceptTcpClient%2A>方法來建立和連線通訊端。

trans-unit.source: The callback delegate calls the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.EndAcceptTcpClient%2A> method to end the asynchronous request.
trans-unit.target: 委派會呼叫回呼<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.EndAcceptTcpClient%2A>方法來結束非同步的要求。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> allows only one underlying socket to listen to a specific port.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，其指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 是否只允許一個基礎通訊端接聽特定的通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> allows only one <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> to listen to a specific port; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 只允許一個 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 接聽特定的通訊埠，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" /> for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Service Pack 2 and later, and <see langword="false" /> for all other versions.
trans-unit.target: 若為 Windows Server 2003 和 Windows XP Service Pack 2 (含) 以後版本，則預設值為 <see langword="true" />；若為所有其他版本，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, multiple listeners can listen to a specific port.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，多個接聽程式可以接聽特定通訊埠。

trans-unit.source: However, only one of the listeners can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port.
trans-unit.target: 不過，只有其中一個接聽程式可以執行網路流量傳送至連接埠的作業。

trans-unit.source: If more than one listener attempts to bind to a particular port, then the one with the more specific IP address handles the network traffic sent to that port.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個接聽程式所要繫結至特定的連接埠，則具有更特定的 IP 位址會處理傳送至該通訊埠的網路流量。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> property to prevent multiple listeners from listening to a specific port.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>屬性，避免多個接聽程式接聽特定連接埠。

trans-unit.source: Set this property before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>, or call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method and then set this property.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>，或呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法並將這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example gets and sets the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會取得並設定<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> has been started.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" /> 已經啟動。

trans-unit.source: Call the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop" /> method and then set the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop" /> 方法，並設定 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the underlying socket.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試存取基礎通訊端時發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> of the current <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> is bound.
trans-unit.target: 繫結至 <see cref="T:System.Net.EndPoint" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A> property to identify the local network interface and port number being used to listen for incoming client connection requests, after a socket connection has been made.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>屬性來識別用來接聽內送的用戶端連接要求，通訊端連線建立之後的區域網路介面和連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: You must first cast this <xref:System.Net.EndPoint> to an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 您必須先將此轉型<xref:System.Net.EndPoint>至<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>。

trans-unit.source: You can then call the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Address%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to retrieve the local IP address, and the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Port%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to retrieve the local port number.
trans-unit.target: 您可以接著呼叫<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Address%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以擷取本機 IP 位址，而<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Port%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，以擷取本機連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the local IP address and port number on which the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> is listening for incoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示本機 IP 位址和連接埠號碼所在<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>接聽內送連接要求。

trans-unit.source: Determines if there are pending connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否有暫止連接要求存在。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if connections are pending; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果連接為暫止，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This non-blocking method determines if there are any pending connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 此非封鎖的方法會判斷是否有任何暫止的連接要求。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> methods block execution until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method has queued an incoming connection request, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A> method can be used to determine if connections are available before attempting to accept them.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法封鎖執行，直到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法已放入佇列的連入連線要求，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A>方法可以用來判斷連線是否可用，然後再嘗試將同意這些授權條款。

trans-unit.source: The following code example checks the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會檢查<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If a connection request is waiting to be accepted, then a call to the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method is made.
trans-unit.target: 如果連線要求正在等待被接受，然後呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法進行。

trans-unit.source: The listener has not been started with a call to <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" />.
trans-unit.target: 尚未以呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start" /> 來啟動接聽項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying network <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得基礎網路 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 基礎 <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to listen for incoming client connection requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> 建立<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>接聽內送的用戶端連接要求。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> can use this property to get this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 類別衍生自<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>可以使用這個屬性，以解決此<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Use the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned by the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Server%2A> property if you require access beyond that which <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> provides.
trans-unit.target: 使用基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Server%2A>屬性，如果您需要存取超過其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>提供。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Server%2A> property only returns the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used to listen for incoming client connection requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Server%2A>屬性只會傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>用來接聽內送的用戶端連接要求。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法接受暫止的連接要求，並取得<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法接受暫止的連接要求，並取得<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Server%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Server%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is retrieved and the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Linger><xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> option is configured to time out after 10 seconds if data still remains in the network buffer after the connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>擷取和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName.Linger><xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>選項設定的逾時時間在 10 秒後如果資料仍會保留在的網路緩衝區之後關閉連接。

trans-unit.source: Starts listening for incoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 啟動對輸入連接要求的接聽。

trans-unit.source: Starts listening for incoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 啟動對輸入連接要求的接聽。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method initializes the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法會初始化基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>、 將它繫結至的本機端點和接聽連入連線嘗試。

trans-unit.source: If a connection request is received, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果收到連線要求時，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法將會要求排入佇列，並繼續接聽其他要求，直到您呼叫<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections, it will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> on the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>收到連接要求它有已排入佇列的連線數目上限之後，它將會擲回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>用戶端上。

trans-unit.source: To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method or the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從連入連線佇列中移除連接，請使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method will remove a connection from the queue and return a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> that you can use to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法會從佇列移除的連接，並傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>可用來傳送和接收資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method will return a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that you can use to do the same.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>可用來執行相同的動作。

trans-unit.source: If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式只需要同步 I/O，請使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more detailed behavioral control, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細的行為的控制項，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 這兩種方法封鎖，直到連接要求佇列中可用為止。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method to close the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> and stop listening.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法，關閉<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>並停止接聽。

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately.
trans-unit.target: 您必須負責個別關閉已接受的連接。

trans-unit.source: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 在應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會輸出追蹤資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="backlog" /> 參數小於零或超過允許的最大連接數。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法，關閉基礎<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode" /> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode" /> 屬性取得特定錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: When you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦取得這個錯誤碼，您就可以參閱 MSDN 中的 Windows Sockets 第 2 版 API 錯誤碼文件，以取得錯誤的詳細描述。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop" /> method also closes the underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />, and creates a new <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop" />方法也會關閉基礎<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />，並建立新<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />如<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set any properties on the underlying <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" /> prior to calling the <see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop" /> method, those properties will not carry over to the new <see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定任何屬性的基礎<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />之前呼叫<see cref="M:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop" />方法，這些屬性將不會延續到新<see cref="T:System.Net.Sockets.Socket" />。
